snippet: The United Nations refugee agency said that 70 percent of its $3.74 billion emergency budget for helping Syrian war refugees remained unfunded, and it warned of “dramatic consequences.”
abstract: United Nations High Commission for Refugees says that 70 percent of its $3.74 billion emergency budget for helping Syrian war refugees remains unfunded; warns of dramatic consequences in the Middle East if donors fail to provide needed aid.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency said that 70 percent of its $3.74 billion emergency budget for helping Syrian war refugees remained unfunded, and it warned of “dramatic consequences.”

headline.main: Syria Aid Needed, Refugee Agency Says
headline.print_headline: Syria Aid Needed, Refugee Agency Says

keywords.value: United Nations High Commission for Refugees
